channel.title: Server Connecting to client prob?
channel.description:
hey mopar. when i run my "Project dungeonfest 562" source and i try to connect it to a client i get this error or something.
[code]log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.execut or.ExecutorFilter). log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.[/code]
on the client it says js5 connect and on the source it says that. and it stops at "connected to update server" any help?

item.title: Server Connecting to client prob?
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

[quote=“562-Pro, post:1, topic:436879”]hey mopar. when i run my “Project dungeonfest 562”
source and i try to connect it to a client i get this error or something.

log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.execut or.ExecutorFilter). log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.

on the client it says js5 connect and on the source it says that.
and it stops at “connected to update server” any help?[/quote]

the js5 means the client cannot connect to the server. Change the IP to make it connect

Read full topic
